title: Internet Radio - amplifying & connecting local communities to global listeners
notes:
Welcome to Etherpad!

	                      Internet Radio - amplifying & connecting local communities to global listeners

Presentation Outline:
    
Internet Radio Context
	* US & Mexico Context at-large
	* independant vs. conglomerate
	
Creative Internet Radio Communities

		* PUYR 
		* Lumpen Radio http://www.lumpenradio.com/
	* Mexico/Mexico City

		* Radioglobal http://www.radioglobal.org/
		* Escuchatorio http://escuchatorio.net/
